snippet.title: Midnight Faerie - Pico-8 / LowRezJam 2017
snippet.description:
"We should do LowRezJam 2017," my brother said.

I hadn't tried making games on my own since ZZT was hot and new.

The game concept as it is: You play as a fairy. Grow a giant strawberry to distract a hungry cyclops. Fail and it walks on your fairy circle on its way to find a suitable snack.

The concept as it started: In the distance, you see a car headed toward 
your fairy circle. Plant explosive mushrooms in its path, and set up pixie archers to launch arrows at it.
